species.name: vanilluxe
descriptions: Each of its two heads has a brain, and when they are in agreement, it attacks its enemies by exhaling a violent blizzard.
Even if it loses one of its heads, it can live relatively problem-free. It makes snow clouds inside its body.
If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
It blasts blizzards from its two mouths. It can create snow anywhere, so it gets a lot of love from skiers and snowboarders.
People believe this Pokémon formed when two Vanillish stuck together. Its body temperature is roughly 21 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: ice-body
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

abilities.name: snow-warning
abilities.effect: Summons hail that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.
